name: It Hungers
description:
You are trapped with a unknown bio form that is overtaking the space station.

You have drones that can push the growth back temporarily but power is running low and it is growing faster than you can kill it.

You have to find the security keys. Doing so will activate a teleporter that you can use to escape and unlock some doors.

Controls:
W to move forwards
S to move backward
A to move left
D to Move right
Q to move Up
Z to move down
Left mouse button to place a drone
Scroll wheel to determine how far away to place a drone.

Notes:
The arrow on the bottom will point to a random security keys or the teleport if it is unlocked.
Drones take a few seconds to activate after being placed.

The game randomizes the initial position of the growth and of the objects. Because of this, it takes a few seconds before the game will let you move. The game will run slower during this period
